PaymentSecurityInfo:
After you make your first purchase, we save a "purchase reference" (not card details!) that only allows re-purchase at the same place you purchased when you entered the details.
In order to maintain the confidentiality of this reference, we encrypt it using the password you will be asked to enter, your password is not saved Nowhere, only those who know the password will be able to make a purchase.
 Even we do not have access to the password - only those who know it

NoPayNoPaymentWithRecieptExplanation: In the bank route, a fee of NIS 1 will be charged for each action you perform, and you can also issue invoices, which means that if you have not performed anything, you will not pay anything, Simple.
NoPayNoPaymentExplanation: In the bank route, a fee of NIS 1 will be charged for each action you perform (without invoices), which means if you have not performed anything, you will not pay anything, simple.
ActoinsPriceExplanation:
In this route you will be charged 29 NIS in advance and you can perform up to 100 operations without additional payment, over 100 operations you will be charged another 30 NIS and you can perform another 150 additional operations at no cost (a total of 250 operations - 59 NIS), at the end of this amount of operations You will be charged NIS 60 again and you will be entitled to another 250 actions (a total of 500 actions - NIS 119), at the end of this amount you will be charged NIS 30 again and you can perform another 500 actions (a total of 1000 actions - NIS 149), after that you will be charged NIS 149 for each 1000 actions more
(the amount of operations resets every month)
SeperateActoinsPriceExplanation:
In this route, you will be charged 35 NIS for 200 receipts, then you can choose to increase the package of withdraws or receipts according to the following specifications - 35 NIS for 500 receipts, then 28 NIS for another 500 receipts (a total of 200 clearings and 1000 receipts - 97 NIS) for every 1000 additional receipts will be charged an additional NIS 63. In addition, you can increase the withdraw package, for another 300 withdraws 35 NIS (a total of 500 withdraws 70 NIS) for another 500 withdraws 51.8 NIS (a total of 1000 withdraws 121.8 NIS) for each 1000 additional withdraws you will be charged an additional 121.8 NIS
(the amount of operations resets every month)

edgesExplain: The customers will always see only the latest and the earliest times that are available each day. This way of working is in blocks, allowing customers more choice options and making sure that you don't have any dead time when you are in your business.

featureExplianServices: It is possible to define a wide range of services that your business offers, we support regular services, multi-participant services, split services, services that require payment in advance, and more

featureExplianCancelNearDeadline: You can prevent customers from being able to cancel the appointment if the appointment date is close, this option ensures that you will not have any last minute surprises

featureExplianMyWorkers: The business can be expanded by adding workers, our system will monitor their activity for you and allow you full control over them

clickBusinesses: The appointment management system builds a landing page for you that can be found on Google, from which your customers will make appointments for you. We emphasize creating uniqueness for your business, so you can control almost everything on your page! Click on the different businesses and jump to their business page, You can get inspiration for your business or just see the capabilities that the system gives to your business.
stableSystem: A queue management system is a critical thing in business, it is important to entrust it to the hands of an experienced software that has been proven to work and will not keep you busy with problems all day, these are our data and what the customers think of us
readyToGoForwords: Ready to take your business to the next level?
workLikePro: Let customers make their own appointments and start working like a pro
clickToWatch: Confused? We have created a simulation of the system for you, the simulation allows you to see how queues are managed in the system. You will be able to see the queues in your calendar, how your customers will make appointments, how they see their queue, and how you will use the system on a daily basis

placingEventDesc: Sync with external calendars, support for setting personal events including personal notifications
personalBrandinDesc2: This business page will also be displayed on Google and will serve as your landing page to refer new customers or customers interested in your service.
personalBrandinDesc: Extensive and easy-to-use business design and branding options that will allow you to build a unique business page for your business, this business page will also be displayed on Google and will serve as your landing page to which you can refer new customers or customers who are interested in your service.
clientsMessagesDesc: Our appointment management system automatically sends customers a reminder to confirm arrival and a reminder about the appointment itself before the appointment time. Reminders reduce cancellations and no-shows by 90%.
clientsMessagesDesc2: Also, the system informs clients about appointments, updates and cancellations. You can also send distribution messages to all your clients in order to keep them updated.
availabilityEverywhereDesc: Your business is available both as a website and in the application and is built in a converting way that motivates the customer to book an appointment. Over 20% of customers make their appointment through the website, your customers will be able to book appointments with you from anywhere!
availabilityEverywhereDesc2: In addition, our queue management system builds you a website in an optimal form for Google search so that you appear high in the search.
clientsDesc: The system provides you with a detailed client management panel that will allow you to easily track your clients.
clientsDesc2: You can view the queue history of each customer, when he arrived and when he was absent, customers who stop coming will be marked so that you can contact them and you can send notifications to customers directly from the application.
cleranceAndreciptsDesc: A variety of customer clearance solutions and issuance of legal receipts, the system allows you to set payment for services and the customer will require payment when booking the appointment or later as you choose.
cleranceAndreciptsDesc2: In addition the system, we will generate a receipt for him automatically. You can also issue receipts, send payment requests to customers, credit and cancel transactions, and more...
supportDesc: Your business is one of the most important things and sometimes you need to talk to someone urgently or you just want to know about capabilities of the queue management system that you didn't know about yet.
supportDesc2: We provide support and human response 24/7 with an average response time of less than 3 minutes! Our support personnel receive excellent reviews and in 97% of cases provide an effective response at the moment of the call.
supportTime: 50 seconds on average for a response
mainFeaturesDesc: The system was specially designed in a way that will allow you full control over your business, we have created for you hundreds of business management options that await you in the system are the features that our customers like the most

privacyDesc: This privacy protection policy forms part of the terms of use of the Simple Tour website. Definitions appearing in this privacy protection policy are as defined below or in the terms of use.
intro1: For the terms listed below, in these regulations, the meaning that appears next to them shall be:
intro3: ×´Business owner×´ - the business owner of that business that the customer registered or placed an order
aboutText: The use of the Simple Tor application below: (the ×´Application×´), is subject to the terms of these regulations. The use of the application is offered for your personal use, on the condition that you agree to accept the terms written in these regulations without any changes. If you do not agree to the terms of use listed in these regulations , all or some of them, you cannot make any use of the application for any purpose.
contact: Get in touch / report a violation of your privacy
contactText1: If you believe that your privacy has been violated during the use of the service, or for any other question regarding this policy, please contact us according to the details below, or through our
contactText2: mechanisms, and we will try to handle your request as soon as possible. Our representatives are at your disposal for any request, response, question or complaint.
personalData: Delivery of details and personal information
personalDataText: Using the service as a rule does not require registration. Registration for the service will only be required when you want to make an appointment or perform another active action in it, such as uploading photos if you are a manager or signing up for business alerts. In order to register, you will need to complete the registration procedure and give us Personal identifying information and contact information - full name and phone number. In order to complete the registration procedure. Without providing the requested information, you will not be able to complete the registration or the requested action. You must provide only Correct, accurate and complete details. The details and information you provide will be stored in the database owned by the service operator. You are not required by law to provide the details and this depends on your will and consent, however incorrect details, or failure to provide all the required details, may prevent you from using some of the service's features , harm the quality of the service provided to you as well as harm the ability to contact you if necessary. The use of the information and details you provide will be as specified in this policy.
dataUsage1: The details and personal information you provide and the details collected by the service operator during your use of the service will be used in accordance with the provisions of this policy or according to the provisions of any law, for the following purposes
dataUsage2: To allow you to use the service and the contents included in it, to allow you to make an appointment with the business owner
dataUsage3: To identify you during your repeated visits to areas that require registration and to save you from entering your details every time
dataUsage4: The information that will be used by the service operator for this purpose will mainly be statistical information, which does not identify you or others personally
dataUsage5: To enable the business owner to receive data
dataUsage6: To allow you to customize the service to your preferences
dataUsage7: To send you from time to time operational messages as well as information about the service, surveys, updates, as well as advertising information and services of the business owner. Such information will be sent to you in accordance with the express consent given by you when you approved the binding agreements, or in any other way.
dataUsage8: You can withdraw your consent at any time and stop receiving advertisements. The way to remove will be given through the application. It is clarified that this consent constitutes consent for the purposes of the provisions of Section 30A of the Telecommunications Law (Bezeq and Services). To contact you when the business owner believes that there is a need for this the proper operation and development of the service.
duties: Duty of the business owner regarding your personal details
duties1: The business owner is obligated to act in accordance with the provisions of any law regarding the personal information he collects about his customers, including information that will come as a result of your use of the service (when you make an appointment and in particular when you arrive at the business and receive services from him directly), including the provisions of the Privacy Protection Law , 1981-1981, the regulations under it (including the privacy protection regulations dealing with the security of personal information) and the guidelines of the Authority for the Protection of Privacy in the Ministry of Justice.
whereDataSaved1: The information that the operator of the service collects is saved in its database, which is stored with server hosting and data backup providers, which may also be located outside the borders of Israel. Your consent to this policy also constitutes consent to the saving of the information abroad and its transfer outside the borders of Israel, if necessary.
dataScurity1: The service operator attaches the utmost importance to the security of the information in its systems. In order to save the information, it operates systems, applications and procedures for the security of the information, designed to minimize the risks of theft, damage, loss or unauthorized access to the information. However, there is no certainty that these applications absolutely guarantee that personal information will not be disclosed or stolen from the databases. Therefore, the service operator does not undertake, and you cannot reasonably expect, that the service and the information systems used by the service operator will be immune from unauthorized access to the information stored in them. By actually using the service, you are aware and agree to these limitations.
rightsText: According to the Privacy Protection Law, every person has the right to review by himself, or by his attorney authorized in writing, or by a guardian, the information about him that is held in a database. A person who reviewed the information about him and finds that it is not correct, complete, clear or up-to-date, may contact the owner of the database with a request to correct the information or delete it. If the owner of the database refused, he must inform the applicant of this in the manner and in the manner prescribed in the regulations under the Privacy Protection Law. Upon the refusal of the owner of the database to allow inspection and a notice of refusal to correct or delete information, the applicant may The information can be appealed in the manner and in the manner prescribed by the regulations.
changesToPrivacyText: The operator of the service may change the provisions of the privacy policy from time to time. If possible, and if substantial changes are made to this policy, a notification will be published on the application interface. The link to the privacy policy placed on the service will always link to the current version of the policy. Continue using the service after publication The updated privacy policy indicates your agreement to it. If you do not agree with the new instructions in the privacy policy, you must stop making any use of the service. The service operator may request your renewed consent to the privacy policy in any case of such a change.

articleTitle2: Queue Management That Works for you
articleContent1: As a business owner who provides customer service, you already know how important it is to manage your diary in an orderly and convenient way to work. And you also know that this task often requires a lot of resources from you such as time, headaches and money.
articleContent2: Managing appointments is a task that almost every business has to deal with, giving customers the opportunity to set appointments, update them or cancel if necessary. Every such event requires a dialogue with the service providers and a check of their working hours. This conduct most of the time happens in a way that is not is effective for the business and requires a large financial outlay. However, it causes trouble on the part of the customer and on the part of the business.
articleContent3: If the customers in the business are regular customers and they are used to making appointments, then they will call or send you a message, something that will require your attention and investment, if the customers are new, this process will cause them a lot of difficulties on the way to booking the appointment, which will most likely lead to so that they don't make an appointment.
articleContent4: In addition, most of the times, dealing physically with a customer can lead to a negative image for the business because it can take time until the customer's call is answered, misunderstandings can arise in the conversation, the customer can react negatively to the lack of queues or inconvenient times. This may lead to have a negative business image despite the work and dedication you invest in your business.
articleContent5: We know that one of the most important things for you is that the customers don't get confused, that it's easy for them.
articleContent6: The appointment system was designed in a convenient and easy-to-use manner that will leave no room for your customers to get into trouble.
articleContent7: From the moment of entering the business page with a few single clicks the customer will book an appointment and view the details of the appointment. On the other hand, you will receive a notification about this and you will be able to see it in your calendar.
articleContent8: We understand that every business has its own requirements and needs that fit its field. The appointment scheduling system was built on the basis of this understanding.
articleContent9: The Simple Tor system is dynamically built giving you a broad toolbox that allows you to get the things your business needs.
articleContent10: If you are still missing something, we provide you with a development team that will adapt the system specifically to your needs and add what is missing.
articleContent11: We have a wide variety of businesses that use the system such as - Nails builders, Manicurists, Tattooists, Barbers, Beauticians, DJs, Private chefs, Clowns, Lawyers, Fitness trainers, Doctors, Accountants and more.
googleDisclosure: Simple Tor's use and transfer of information received from the Google Calendar API comply with the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements. To learn more
faq1: Is it necessary to download the application?
faq2: Your customers do not need to download the application in order to book appointments with you, they can always enter your link that will send them to the website that the system builds for you and they will be able to order from there with a click.
faq3: Is it possible to define several different types of services?
faq4: Of course! You define a topic (for example - haircuts) in the system, and under it you can define a number of services (for example - a man's haircut, haircut + beard) and even determine the order of their display to customers. There is no limit on the number of services or topics.
faq5: Can I ask for something specific?
faq6: We have an entire team dedicated only to customer requests, the system is updated on a monthly basis and in each such update we include requests that customers have asked of us, the system is built in a very dynamic way and everything can be adjusted to your needs.
faq7: must the customers decide for themselves?
faq8: No, you can schedule them in a simple way from your personal schedule and you can also set that the customers cannot schedule appointments themselves at all.
faq9: Who is the system suitable for?
faq10: The Simple Tor system for appointment management is suitable for all types of service providers or customer receivers who need to schedule and manage appointments or meetings. We have businesses of all types, for example - manicurists, Nails builders, Barbers, Beauticians, Fitness trainers, DJs, Private chefs, Clowns, Attorneys, Tattoo artists, Doctors, Accountants and dozens of other types of businesses that cannot be listed here.
faq11: Do you need to put credit?
faq12: No, in fact we do not require credit at all, from the moment the business is created a 30-day free trial begins, after which a subscription is required, the purchase is made like an in-app purchase by Apple Pay or Google Pay and there is no need to transfer your credit to us.
faq14: Sure! The system allows you to set up waiting lists when the queues are taken or in general at the end of each day so that you always have customers to fill holes. As soon as a queue becomes available or you open more work times, all those registered to the waiting list will receive a notification to make an appointment.
faq16: The Simple Tor queue management system gives you a powerful panel to control and manage employees, you can change everything for them from your device. In addition, you can grant or remove permissions for certain things such as scheduling vacations, uploading photos, etc.
faq17: Is there synchronization with other calendars?
faq18: The Simple Tor system allows full synchronization with the Google calendar and in addition synchronization with the device's calendar. You can view the events you have on Google and add the events from your schedule to the device's calendar.
faq20: All of your history is saved for you on our servers in order to provide you with reports and improve your business, you can turn off the saving of the history with one click and all the history will be deleted and will no longer be saved.
